title: Create a Blues palette — Blues

title: Modify a color — MutateColorParameter
text: Modify color parameter saturation, light alpha parameter.

title: Modify a color — MutateColorParameter
code: MutateColorParameter(   color.col = NULL,   operation.str = NULL,   parameter.str = NULL,   alpha.bln = FALSE,   prctMutation.num = 0.2 )

title: Modify a color — MutateColorParameter
text: color.col <character numeric>: color format. operation.str <character>: must one "=", "+", "-", "*", "/", "%*%" "%/%". "=" put choosen parameter prctMutation value; e.g parameter=0.6 prctMutation.num=0.2 returned parameter=0.2 "+" add choosen parameter prctMutation value; e.g parameter = 0.6 prctMutation.num=0.2 returned parameter=0.8 (0.6+0.2) "-" subtract choosen parameter prctMutation value; e.g parameter = 0.6 prctMutation.num = 0.2 returned parameter=0.4 (0.6-0.2) "*" increases choosen parameter prctMutation value; e.g parameter = 0.6 prctMutation.num = 0.2 returned parameter=0.72 (0.6 + 0.6*0.2) "/" decreases choosen parameter prctMutation value; e.g parameter = 0.6 prctMutation.num = 0.2 returned parameter=0.48 (0.6 - 0.6*0.2) "%*%" increases choosen parameter prctMutation value rest; e.g parameter = 0.4 prctMutation.num = 0.2 returned parameter=0.68 (0.6 + 0.4*0.2) "%/%" decreases choosen parameter prctMutation value rest; e.g parameter = 0.4 prctMutation.num = 0.2 returned parameter=0.32 (0.6 - 0.4*0.2) parameter.str <character>: parameter modify (one "saturation", "light", "alpha"). alpha.bln <logical>: whether alpha layer returned. (Default FALSE) prctMutation.num <numeric>: percentage modification. Must [0-1]. (Default 0.2)

title: Modify a color — MutateColorParameter
code: MutateColorParameter(     color.col="#ebb0107f",     operation.str="+",     parameter.str="light",     alpha.bln=TRUE,     prctMutation.num=0.2 ) #> [1] "#f5d06c7f"
